short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep all your web games in a better place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Game Keep is a handy extension for building a personal library of web games and Apps. 
It allows you to save links to your favorite games and organize them into categories for easy access. 
The extension automatically scans web pages for game-related signs and suggests saving them to your collection. You can also share game links with others directly from the extension. 
The interface features a sleek, user-friendly design, making it a breeze to manage your game library.

Key Features:
    Automatic detection of web games on pages.
    Save and organize game links into categories.
    Share game links with friends.
    Sleek and stylish interface for easy game library management.

Guide:
change category ⬅️ ➡️
choose game ⬆️ ⬇️
run game [space]
quit edit [esc]
change theme [shift] + [1] or [2] or [3] or [4]
